Release v1.0.0 - Initial Public Release

This is the first stable release of BasePack, a comprehensive DevOps toolkit for Laravel projects.

## Major Features:
- Complete Docker-based development and production environment
- 9 powerful Artisan commands for DevOps automation
- Smart SSL certificate detection and management
- Comprehensive Makefile with 30+ commands
- Real-time container monitoring dashboard
- Auto-fix diagnostic capabilities

## Security (CVE-2025-49844 Mitigation):
- Redis security hardening with password authentication
- Network isolation (no public port exposure)
- Disabled dangerous commands (FLUSHDB, FLUSHALL, CONFIG, SHUTDOWN, DEBUG)
- Updated to Redis 7.4-alpine with latest security patches
- Protected mode enabled
- Comprehensive security documentation

## Documentation:
- Professional README.md with complete installation guide
- SECURITY.md with vulnerability reporting process
- CONTRIBUTING.md with development guidelines
- CHANGELOG.md for version tracking
- TESTING.md explaining test architecture

## Tested Against:
- PHP 8.1, 8.2, 8.3
- Laravel 10.x, 11.x, 12.x
- 47 tests, 181 assertions - all passing
